attributes.action: Close the universities and  implement online courses.
attributes.additional_details: The COVID-19 overseas is very serious. Don’t bring in a large number of students who may be carrying the virus because of the opening of the university.
attributes.background: International students who have not entered the UK will not be allowed to enter the UK in 2020, so as not to bring the virus and cause a greater burden on the UK's medical system.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552512
